in the early 70s preston nichols an
engineer who specialized in

every day his subject's minds would be

blackout
he learned that whenever 410 to 420

jammed and after 20 minutes the signal

transceiver and tracked the origin of
the signal to montauk point on the east
end of long island new york more
specifically he traced the signal to a
large radar tower on montauk air force
base so there was nothing he could do
about it the radio interference
continued for a few years and eventually

friend who said the air force base was
now abandoned and he should go check it

here cleared out in a hurry
